Articles.Content: I challenge you to design and launch a huge space station with ion rockets at least 25. Have a base for each planet and moon connected to put it there. Bring stations to put around every celestial object. When done use it as a station past eeloo way past it like 1000000 k after.

1: I have a gift for you:

This is empty space. Use it to separate complete thoughts.

2: Here is another gift: .,;:?!

These are punctuation marks. Use them to separate breaks and sentences in your thoughts.

Use these things well, and you can achieve many things.

As for the challenge, due to the huge buff in ION engine performance, I think it's a great and very possible challenge to do. We do need bigger Xenon tanks though, because the mothership is going to be whackjob-sized parts count.
